item.title: Annual State Fire Inspections in Residential Buildings Begin September 3
item.description: The New York State Office of Fire Prevention and Control (OFPC) conducts annual building inspections of all college and universities across the state. Inspections of RPI residential buildings will begin on September 3, 2025, and are expected to take approximately three to four weeks.

item.title: ID Cards Required to Access Meal Plans in Dining Hall
item.description: We hope your semester is off to a great start! Please be reminded that starting immediately, all students with an active meal plan must present their valid student ID card to access meals in the dining halls. This policy helps ensure efficient service and accurate meal tracking.

item.title: Stephanie Boluk and Patrick LeMieux: Hands Free: A History of Accessible Alt Ctrls |Sept. 23
item.description:
This presentation begins with a brisk survey of the history of hands-free video game interfaces before comparing and contrasting two devices that articulate two different design philosophies: the NES Hands Free and the Octopad. Rather than thinking about accessibility as a single-player problem, these controllers engage the social, political, and environmental aspects of video games to change the way we play. Join us on September 23 at 4:30pm on Webex.
